body:
It's been 3 years since I have joined this server. 2 years of which have been staff. (Adding alt accounts)
Ask me anything


It's been a bumpy journey, but it's really assited me develop as an individual! Thanks to all of those who have been an important role model, friend and influence as a staff member and general community member. Here are  wombats I've known for most of my time on Avicus :)

@howsie: You may not see this, but you were someone I looked up to back when you were an admin. Thanks for sticking with the sistahood while it lasted too :)

@para: I've known you for the majority of my time here, and I believe our first time we talked was during the onion throwing or even at OCN! Even now you are no afraid of speaking your opinion and I respect that. I remember our talks when we had no one to go to.

@yoav: General legend, you know it :) Too much to say about you but thank god I met you on teamspeak that one day.

@everyone: If you have talked to me for a while, you know I can get off the rails quite a lot, but it's all banter! Thanks for all the wonderful experiences here so far, and let's hope there are plenty more to come!

replies.body:
Wow, 3 years man. That's quite some time. Well, believe it or not I still remember when I first met you. That day man, you were freaking awesome. The first time I had a real conversation with you, I knew you were a great guy. I've never really met anyone else besides Apricot and Peachy that had that same effect on me. Honestly I'm just glad I was able to be introduced to someone like you in my life. It may not have been in person, but that doesn't matter to me. You've been there since the day I met you, and I can't thank you enough for that. Glad to see you're still going strong!

Okay so I guess it's question time:

How is everything?

How's the Administration going? Any significant changes since the last time?

Are you enjoying your time as a Staff Member again?

Oh and P.S. "The hill" was a success.

-Jake <3

-Jake <3

replies.body: Gg Jozz :)
replies.body_tagged: Gg Jozz :)

replies.body:
@Aura:
I haven't talked to you much on TS, but you seemed incredibly energetic, and you can be childish at times, but it's funny to listen to x)

Wombats ON meth :))

Liam's accent is pretty sexy I must admit.

Oh yeah dude! /ban AuraMC_ Too ez
Me: *muzzes*

@Petlas
I don't know, there are many better muzzers out there!!!

@Pelpelajax
Really efficient. More money than usual lately :)

@HarryRules
I haven't had a proper convo with you in a while, but a while back in the old days you were so chill to talk to :P

@Eteh:
Amazing mate, you're one of the players who make my experience on Nebula much more enjoyable than it would have been! You make me laugh sometimes x) We can do some rushing seshs, but that will have to wait :(

@7at0rt0t
Yeah pre good, you?

@Rememes
I moved on from vegemite! NUTRI GRAIN :D

@RiloYT
Didn't I already beat you? Why need a rematch when we already know I'm going to win :D
I like watching Anime because I enjoy looking at the culture differences Japan has, not to mention the animation and designs are pretty damn nice. I believe it has better plots than other types of shows too :D

I don't always strafe, I straightline most of the time lel

@iiDarudePvP
Yes, probably!

@Howsie
I could definitely do without school exams... would free up a lot of my time :P and something I want/need right now... hmmm, good question! I probably want to talk to the old sistahood members again, even if it's once!

@Posigndun
Hardworking senior mod, always does what he is asked of. You and I share some great memories, one being some of the Australian jokes we throw around that make people say "wtf"

@Dawson_
Don't know who you are, sorry :(

Probably a walls god, yes!?

I'm not a wombat :(( Posigndun is!

Too late for that now dude :(

@Jake
Yeah very busy... next 3 months I won't be able to even touch a computer ;p

More demanding... that's for sure. Other than that not much change since you were admin :P

I am enjoying it, yes! I wish I could stay for longer though :(

@Frosted
The ballzi chats x') Even the ToD lol!
I like being admin, since I enjoy managing things!

@Adit:
Nothing against OCN, I just find it rather difficult to get into. I try and play some ocn maps and they just seem too "gimmicky" and "complex". I like simple.

@Yuicide
Sure, one day :)
I am going to Sydney quite frequently actually. May be going there for 1 month in Jan! Maybe meetup??
Yeah I guess :P I still beat Riflers and Doritohs (my buds ;3). Haven't gone on kohi in like 2 weeks though.

@Grape:
Obvious answer; muzz

@Thorn:
For sure!

@Nolan
Definitely the staff structure and the senior staff team. Not to mention the gamemodes/player count C:

@Laugh
Real

@Cyn
Never had enemies nor grudges. I try and find positives in people rather than thinking about "placing grudges".

People may hold grudges against me though, for whatever reason :P

Thanks everyone for the kind thank-yous! Unfortunately it's time to go :( I won't be able to go on in the next 3 months since I'm that busy. I want someone who is going to be active to replace me so things get done in that time! 

Bye Avicus, and goodbye to everyone :) Won't forget the memories I've had both negative and positive :P
